cache_directory.field_description: Directory for base_year cache, relative to OPUS_DATA_PATH or OPUS_HOME/data, e.g. seattle_parcel/base_year_data

argument.name: cache_directory_root
argument.field_description: Directory for base_year cache, relative to OPUS_DATA_PATH or OPUS_HOME/data, e.g. seattle_parcel/runs

argument.name: existing_cache_to_copy
